BBEX3.M.ERN.EUR.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Eritrea / EUR 1 = ERN ... (buying)

Comment on 1999-11: On 15 November 1999, the nakfa was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  12 November 1999: EUR 1 = ERN 8.4276 / 8.6383  15 November 1999: EUR 1 = ERN 9.9464 / 10.1558.  Calculated devaluation:15.1% (middle rate).

Comment on 2001-09: On 10 September 2001, the nakfa was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  7 September 2001: EUR 1 = ERN 9.0494 / 9.1382  10 September 2001: EUR 1 = ERN 12.1718 / 12.4900.  Calculated devaluation:26.3% (middle rate).
